item.title: Tennis winners - scraping and plotting
item.description: Intro In this tutorial, we will be plotting tennis players Grand Slam Tournament wins. The data comes from the Tennis Grand Slam Tournaments results from the ESP website. [^1] We will scrape the data and continue with the visualization thereafter. Libraries Overall, we are going to use the following R packages: library(XML) # for web scraping library(rvest) # for web scraping library(dplyr) # for dataset manipulation library(knitr) # for nice dataset printing library(hrbrthemes) # Aesthetic defaults for ggplot2 charts library(ggthemes) # Themes ggplot2 library(ggplot2) # Charts library(stringr) # Manipulating strings Scraping We will be scraping HTML Table with the XML package.
